contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} A '''ruffian''' is a [[wikt:scoundrel|scoundrel]], [[wikt:rascal|rascal]] or unprincipled, deceitful, and unreliable person. As a proper noun, '''Ruffian''' may refer to: *[[Ruffian (horse)]] (1972-1975), a famous thoroughbred racehorse *[[Ruffian (film)]], 2007 television movie about the racehorse *[[Ruffian Games]], a Scottish games developer *Ruffian, a [[chess engine]] *[[Border Ruffian]]s, pro-Slavery activists from Missouri in the American Civil War *[[The Ruffian on the Stair]], a British play *[[HMS Bellerophon (1786)]], also known as '''''Billy Ruffian''''' *The Ruffians, the major antagonists of the [[Nintendo]] game [[Sin and Punishment]] *British codename of the German [[X-Geraet]] radar system. {{disambig}}
